rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C181170

definition: A terminology codelist relevant to the description of the high-level purpose of the test at the operational level.
name: Test Operational Objective

terms.definition: A test whose operational purpose is to verify the presence or absence of a substance or organism.
A test whose operational purpose is to determine the amount or concentration of a substance or organism.
A test whose operational purpose is to determine the presence or absence of a substance or organism.
